entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016
